mapper.select: SELECT T1.MEMBER_EMAIL AS MEMBER_EMAIL , T1.MEMBER_PW AS MEMBER_PW , T1.MEMBER_NICK AS MEMBER_NICK , NVL(T1.MEMBER_BIRTH,CURRENT_DATE) AS MEMBER_BIRTH , T1.MEMBER_PHONE AS MEMBER_PHONE , T1.BGIMG_SEQ AS BGIMG_SEQ , T2.BGIMG_PATH as BGIMG_PATH , NVL(T1.MEMBER_INTRO,' ') AS MEMBER_INTRO , T1.MEMBER_BLACKYN AS MEMBER_BLACKYN , NVL(T1.MEMBER_BLACK_REASON, ' ') AS MEMBER_BLACK_REASON FROM MEMBER T1, BGIMAGE T2 WHERE T1.BGIMG_SEQ = T2.BGIMG_SEQ(+) AND T1.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{MEMBER_EMAIL}
SELECT count(*) FROM member m, blacklist_diary bd WHERE m.member_email = bd.member_email AND bd.BLACKLIST_USER_EMAIL = #{BLACKLIST_USER_EMAIL}
SELECT count(*) FROM member m, blacklist_reply br WHERE m.member_email = br.member_email AND br.BLACKLIST_MEMBER_EMAIL = #{BLACKLIST_MEMBER_EMAIL}
